text: Frederick Carlton "Carl" Lewis (born July 1, 1961) is an American retired track and field athlete. He has won nine Olympic gold medals and eight World Championships. Lewis became an actor and has appeared in a number of movies. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:African-American track and field athletes Category:American sprinters Category:American movie actors Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Alabama Category:Actors from Birmingham, Alabama
title: Carl Lewis
